summary: Can 'Star Wars' Survive Kathleen Kennedy's Critically Acclaimed Box Office Hits?
title: Can 'Star Wars' Survive Kathleen Kennedy's Critically Acclaimed Box Office Hits?
description: Lucasfilm demoting or firing one of the most powerful female producers in Hollywood after four straight $1 billion+ grossers with female leads after one male-led flop (which, we should note, was greenlit by Disney’s Bob Iger) and replacing her with a dude, even Dave Filoni, would be a horrible look. I love Star Wars: Rebels too, but, well, ick. It would also be a sign of desperation from a company that has no cause to panic.

summary: For anons…reader is a princess as requested. (slight au, but still possible within sw canon) “Your majesty,” you addressed Leia...
caption:
For anons…reader is a princess as requested. (slight au, but still possible within sw canon)

“Your majesty,” you addressed Leia with a low bow.

You may have been royalty, but Queen Leia was the matriarch of the new Empire. You two were even on good terms with each other, which only added to showing her respect. The aged woman smirked before raising a wrinkled hand.

“Stand, daughter of the Empire.”
Though confused by the title, you rose. “How may I assist you, my liege.”
“As you have witnessed, this Galaxy is entering an era of reconstruction that will bring about Peace.”
Given a moment of silence to answer, you nodded. “Yes. And the people chose you to be the momentary unifier for this time, my Queen.”
Leia smiled. She didn’t enjoy titles, but she knew you only meant respect. “That’s correct. Unfortunately, the effects of the war has bred hatred toward unknowing participants in the First Order. I believe, in order to show that their hearts can change, a statement must be made.”
You knit your brows. “Pardon, but how could I possibly help with this?”
“Your people, with your leadership, have shown continued compassion to both sides. They all believe that mistakes do not define someone, even those with great horrors in their past.”
You nodded. “I still believe peace can shine on everyone if they would let it.”
“Yes, Y/N. I have a way to show that.”
“How?”
“You remember my son, Ben.”

It was more of a statement than a question. Of course you remembered Ben. Not just for his cruelty during the war, but for what he was like before it. You hadn’t been training to be a Jedi, but you were there with Luke while he trained new Jedi. You had fallen in love with the boy, despite the darkness that radiated off of him. You still held hope that he’d return. You thought you had been proven wrong when Han died.

You lowered your head slightly.

“Yes, your Majesty.”
Leia smiled to herself. “He’s returned.”

Your eyes widened in genuine shock. The last you heard of him was, well, when he was Kylo Ren. Heart racing and cheeks heating, you couldn’t believe the words you had heard. The one thing you had been desperately wanting to believe for all those years was finally true, and you couldn’t fathom it.

“Are…Are you sure?”
Leia laughed. “Yes dear.” She turned to her right. “Come in.”

All the breath left your lungs, igniting them with disbelief and joy. Ben Solo stood before you. He was a man; a man with scars and changed eyes…but he was alive and free of darkness. He was looking at you with unsureness and hope. Despite the electricity urging you to run to him, you glanced back at Leia. She gleefully chuckled.

“Yes, go!”

Just like that, you were disregarding any social intricacies that came with being a princess and jumped into his arms. He caught you in a desperate hug, hiding his face in your shoulder. He spun you slightly.

“Y/N,” he whispered, “I’m so sorry.”

He let your feet reunite with the ground. Both of you had tears shining your cheeks. You held his face in your hands, softly reassuring him.

“You’re back. That’s all that matters.”

A thought brought you to look back to the queen. Knitting your brows, you were still trying to put together what this meant.

“How?”
“I’ve arranged with your parents for you two to be wed.”
Your mouth dropped. “What?”
“With you two married, it will show the Galaxy that hearts can change and peace can exist.”

Your face split into a grin. He turned to face the smiling, though teary, Kylo…no Ben Solo. You brushed his hair out of his face.

“Is this what you want?” you queried.
He let out a laugh that sounded like a sob. “After everything I’ve done, I think I should be asking you that question.”
“I couldn’t be happier.”
He placed his forehead against yours. “Me either.”

Leia watched on with a peaceful smile, one she hadn’t worn in years. As the two embraced each other once again, she couldn’t help but feel secure. With those two married, others will follow and see that peace can exist in a galaxy of different ideals and past mistakes.

Perma-tags: @beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep @ttelesilla @jumperswellies @caitsymichelle13 @myplaceofthingsilove @frostbyte-horan @bestillmystuckyheart @littlestfangirl @anali-022506 
Semi-tags: @bi-shy-and-ready-to-die @michaelathewordsmith

blog.name: starwargift

blog.description: You do not have to go to a galaxy far far away to look for special Star Wars Gifts. Check Out our Top Picks & May The 🎁 Be With You ✊

blog.name: jabariqueen
blog.title: I saw a superhero last night, he was black
blog.description: laura, 22, she/her. black and increasingly tired.

summary: Interesting analysis and criticism of the way protagonists are written in Rogue One and The Force Awakens. For example he talks...
caption:
Interesting analysis and criticism of the way protagonists are written in Rogue One and The Force Awakens. For example he talks about how Rey is an active protagonist, while Jyn is a mostly passive protagonist, which makes it more difficult for the audience to know her true nature. I feel like the commentator should have also focused on Finn when it came to character arcs and meaningful choices, but that’s life I guess.

Anyway, this channel usually makes interesting and well done videos about screenplay, storylines, editing etc.

Anyway, this channel usually makes interesting and well done videos about screenplay, storylines, editing etc.

summary: They Who Hold The Galaxy Upon a String
title: They Who Hold The Galaxy Upon a String
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LKwgTY

by mademoisellebianx

It had irked Armitage Hux for so long that Kylo Ren had never given much of his attention to him. It’s ironic how much he had wanted the attention of someone he supposedly hated. After proposing a truce between him and the Supreme Leader that backfires when Kylo asks him to prove his loyalty by becoming his consort, he finally he got all, if not most, of Kylo’s attention. Too much of it, in fact.

Words: 18319, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy, Star Wars Episode VII: The Force Awakens (2015), Star Wars Episode VIII: The Last Jedi (2017)
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Armitage Hux, Kylo Ren, Original Characters

  • Additional Tags: consort!Hux AU, Canon-Typical Violence, Post-Canon, Past Child Abuse, mentioned alcohol use, Implied/Referenced Rape/Non-con, (not between Kylo and Hux), (tagged just to be sure), Soft Kylux, Explicit Sexual Content, Fluff and Angst

Art by David Marquez and Matthew Wilson

summary: Hey can anyone else not sleep because darth maul made a 3 second cameo in the han solo movie, placing it timeline-wise before...
body: Hey can anyone else not sleep because darth maul made a 3 second cameo in the han solo movie, placing it timeline-wise before the phantom menace, and then subsequently doing the math to figure out that because of this, han solo would then be roughly 53 years old by the time a new hope rolls around and i JUST SAW SOLO and im having a VERY ROUGH NIGHT because of it

reblog.comment: Hey can anyone else not sleep because darth maul made a 3 second cameo in the han solo movie, placing it timeline-wise before the phantom menace, and then subsequently doing the math to figure out that because of this, han solo would then be roughly 53 years old by the time a new hope rolls around and i JUST SAW SOLO and im having a VERY ROUGH NIGHT because of it

leia (19): *is a senator of her planet and rebellion leader* *takes part in politics* *bosses men around her*
rey (19): *manages...
body:
leia (19): *is a senator of her planet and rebellion leader* *takes part in politics* *bosses men around her*
rey (19): *manages to become the hope of the resistance and get a hot emo boyfriend in two or three days*

me (19): *fails to get a partner for graduation dance*
